short_description: Journey to the heart of Arabia in Yemen, where ancient mud-brick skyscrapers, colorful souks, and stunning landscapes await. Visit the historic city of Sana'a, explore the desert village of Shibam, or hike to the beautiful Socotra Island

alcohol_info: Exception in Aden Region where it's legal for 21 and up

weather.title: Yemen has a desert and subtropical climate with hot temperatures year-round. It experiences very little rainfall, and temperatures can reach scorching levels, particularly in the coastal regions

when_to_visit.title: Summer
when_to_visit.short_description: Extremely hot temperatures and humidity make outdoor activities difficult

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Yemen is during the cooler months from November to February when the weather is milder, and you can explore the country's historical sites, including Sana'a's Old City and the ancient city of Shibam
